div.p: (Friendly arguing about a football game) NARRATOR: People in the green phase who drink generally have a "take-it-or-leave-it" feeling about alcohol.

NARRATOR: If they are watching a football game, or at a party and alcohol is available, that's fine. If not, that's fine too. They don't feel strongly about it either way. (Continued arguing about a football game, doorbell rings)
TRAVIS: I'll grab it. (Continued arguing about a football game)
TRAVIS: Hey, Miguel. There's some food over there and I think there's a beer in the fridge.
MIGUEL: Thanks man. Hey, has the game started?
TRAVIS: Yeah. (Continued arguing about a football game)
NARRATOR: People in the green phase may drink, but they don't use illegal drugs at all, and they use prescription drugs only according to the directions.
